duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outpatient physical therapy services, including patient assessment, treatment, and rehabilitation exercise programs.
Collaborate with a multi-disciplinary team to ensure holistic care and effective treatment plans for patients.
Maintain documentation and records of patient progress, treatment plans, and outcomes.
Participate in FPTA and APTA activities to stay updated on industry best practices and standards.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Physical Therapy (DPT) or Master of Physical Therapy (MPT) degree from an accredited program.
